channel.title: Barrage farcast(delta)
channel.description:
hey guyz can some1 help me?
this wat heppns when i attack a player
when i barrage some1 they can attack me and follow.
means the barrage dosn't hold back but yes he cannot run away he can only attack me with melee and follow me.
is there anywayz to make the player stand @ 1 place while when i barrage them?
thanks plz help me out:)
